summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 9511, entitled "An Ordinance making it unlawful for any person, firm or corporation to dump or place upon any land within the limits of the City of Seattle, or in any water or waterways within said city, any waste vegetable matter, any deed animals, butcher's offal, fish or parts of fish, or waste animal matter, and providing the matter in which the same shall be collected, removal and destroyed, and prescribing the punishment for each violation of any of the provisions of this ordinance," approved April 15, 1903.
